snippet.title: [PV] Sleep Stream - Unleashing Layla's Nightmares! - Eng Ver.
snippet.description:
We’re thrilled to introduce our latest creation: [Sleep Stream] - a heart-pounding survival roguelite where every decision could be your last! 

Wishlist on Steam now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2839200/Sleep_Stream/

🔹 Unique character selection: No two runs are the same.
🔹 Intense Combat: Master an array of weapons and strategies.
🔹 Resource Management: Balance survival with gold management.
🔹 Synergy: Backbone of Sleep Stream. Gives magic and life to users' items.

Get ready to embark on an adventure full of danger, mystery, and endless possibilities. Jump into Sleep Stream and free Layla from her grueling nights!
